attributes.review: Okay first off this app Is horrible I don’t think I can bow down to this orange small dingaling president no more 😭👹🤚🏼 so I was just eating my cereal and I was on the app and all the sudden it zapped my dog and KILLED HER 😭😭😭  do NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP if you love your dogs Rest In Peace meatloaf 😔💔 🕊
attributes.title: This app killed my dog 😔✨💔

attributes.review: this app is stinky. it literally made my phone smell. it smelled like a mixture of failure, racism, bigotry, ignorance, fake tan, old money, and burger king. i wouldn’t recommend this to anyone who wants a clean smelling phone. you will smell like the most hated person in the world who only eats burgers. like it’s cool if you want to smell like someone who lies for their own personal gain, it’s just not my type. instead head to bath and body works and buy their signature scent a thousand wishes
attributes.title: smelly

attributes.review: I was very frightened,thinking I could vote from the comfort of my own home trump knocked on my door with a yellow Polkadotted  two piece,  danced to Rihanna’s umbrella song and proceeded to end with a split. Safe to say I will not be using this app again.
attributes.title: Not the app for me.

attributes.review: This is literally the worst app I have ever got , it took a lifetime to download and the app was sooo slow , I tried restarting my phone and that didn’t even work. They need to take this down NOW ! Besides who wants a app with- nvm
attributes.title: App

attributes.review: my dear son dr pepper sadly past away from this app then when he went into the store he grabbed his daughters hand and said let’s go fishing so the went to the bowling alley and got a hole in one. craziest happens things that day
attributes.title: I’m sorry

attributes.review: This app is awful after downloading I have been feeling watched wherever I go and it won’t stop it took forever to download and there is no purpose for an app like this
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes to see information about trumps plans for his presidency and his solutions to COVID-19. The only thing that I got from the app was disappointment. Our “president” is a whiny man child and will stop at nothing to get his racist and sexist agendas passed.
attributes.title: Disgraceful

attributes.review: The app took weeks to download and continued to run my batter. The app gives me no alerts for any events and has entirely too many ads. I hate the graphics and the entire look of the app.
attributes.title: Worst app made EVER

attributes.review: when i opened the app it told me to go outside. so i walked downstairs and outside. when i opened the door, the app developers were standing in my yard throwing tomatoes at me. so disappointing. will not be returning to the app. it also gave me a heart attack when i saw trumps face on the screen. i recommend using the app with parent supervision so you don’t get scared to death. the orange man was really traumatizing. anyways settle for biden 2020
attributes.title: the worst app i’ve ever used😾

attributes.review: I opened the app and my cousin suddenly bursts through the door and says “hey is that the Trump 2020 app” and I said “ indeed it is” and then he grabbed my leg and we started making out. So overall didn’t like it
attributes.title: This app made me homosexual
